metadata.title: CVE-2016-5605 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component before5.1.4 in Oracle Virtualization allows remote attackers to affectconfidentiality and integrity via vectors related to VRDE.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
